name: Shield Master

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Shield Bash, Shield Proficiency, Shield Slam, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +11.

sections.body: You do not suffer any penalties on attack rolls made with a shield while you are wielding another weapon. Add your shield's enhancement bonus to attacks and damage rolls made with the shield as if it was a weapon enhancement bonus.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your mastery of the shield allows you to fight with it without hindrance.
